TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InheritanceMappingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class InheritanceMappingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class InheritanceMappingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 映射 LINQ to SQL 应用程序中的继承层次结构。

span.span: Maps an inheritance hierarchy in a LINQ to SQL application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个指定每个映射的类。One is specified per mapped class. 映射继承层次结构时，请注意以下事项：Note the following when you map inheritance hierarchies: - 层次结构中的所有类必须都映射到单个表。All classes in a hierarchy must be mapped to a single table. - 继承层次结构的表必须位于层次结构的顶层的映射类型上声明。The table for an inheritance hierarchy must be declared on the mapped type that is at the top of the hierarchy. 不能从 top 类派生的类中指定的表或映射的属性。You cannot specify the table or mapping attributes in a class that is derived from the top class. - 可以使用层次结构中的接口，但[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]没有映射。You can use an interface in a hierarchy, but [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] does not map it. - 映射类，但您可以查询映射的类时，可以跳过在层次结构中的类。You can skip a class in the hierarchy when you map classes, but you can query against mapped classes only. 针对正确具体化，鉴别器代码值必须是唯一的并与数据库中的值匹配。For correct materialization, discriminator code values must be unique and match the values in the database. 通过使用具有不完全匹配 （甚至通过大小写） 的鉴别器代码值的行实例化的类设置为`true`。A row with a discriminator code value that does not exactly match (even by casing) instantiates the class by using set to `true`. ## Examples 此示例演示继承映射层次结构的顶部，在其中映射类 (`Shape`) 是抽象的。This example shows inheritance mapping for a hierarchy where the top, mapped class (`Shape`) is abstract. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/vb/Module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何包含未映射的类。The following example shows the inclusion of unmapped classes. 可以将未映射的类放在层次结构中的任意位置。You can put unmapped classes anywhere in the hierarchy. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.InheritanceMappingAttribute/vb/Module1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当鉴别器值与指定值不匹配时是否实例化此类型的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets whether an object of this type in instantiated when the discriminator value does not match a specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个业务属性必须使用声明作为`true`。Exactly one of the attributes must be declared with as `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置层次结构中类的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the class in the hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在继承层次结构，包括根类型中使用任何非抽象类型。Use any non-abstract type in the inheritance hierarchy, including the root type.
